title: Reliability-Based Machine Learning: Practical Implementation Using Ensemble Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Basic machine learning concepts (classification, regression), Python programming, and foundational statistics
context.additional_context: Practice-centered design for working learners. Utilizing Jupyter Notebook in BYOD environments. Applying medical data cases (heart disease, diabetes)

learning_goals: Learners can design a confidence-based prediction model for binary classification problems using an ensemble learning structure
Learners can implement an algorithm that calculates sample-specific confidence levels by combining One-Class Classifiers in a multi-layered structure
Learners can explain practical evaluation methods for classification systems incorporating a reject option
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
